DataElement.preferredName: Bioconductor caAffy Invariant Set Normalization Programming Parameter Baseline Type BaselineType
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Method to normalize arrays in an AffyBatch using an invariant set, as defined in documents avaiable at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html:A value that is passed to a routine._A starting point to which things may be compared.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._The method used for baseline removal during invariant set normalization

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The method used for baseline removal during invariant set normalization_Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Method for identifying invariant set normalization baseline using mean expression values. Defined in the documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html.
Method for identifying invariant set normalization baseline using median expression values. Defined in the documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html.
Method for identifying invariant set normalization baseline using psuedo mean expression values. Defined in the documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html.
Method for identifying invariant set normalization baseline using psuedo median expression values. Defined in the documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
